resources.string:
BoatApp (CosineMath,MIT)
Gson (Google,Apache-2.0)
JNDCrash (ivanarh,Apache-2.0)
XZ for Java (Lasse Collin,Public Domain)
GL4ES (ptitSeb,MIT)
OpenAL Soft (kcat,GPL-2.0)
FileDownloader (lingochamp,Apache-2.0)
BubbleLayout (MasayukiSuda,MIT)
AndroidRocker (kongqw,all)
colorpicker (QuadFlask,Apache-2.0)
AOF-Dev (MCinaBox ljy122@qq.com)\nAnd all the project contributors

MCinaBox Minecraft Launcher is a free and open source Minecraft launcher that allows players to install, manage, and play Minecraft Java Edition on Android devices conveniently and quickly. For launcher updates, please refer to the release page of the project’s GitHub page.\nWhen you use this software, it means that you have read and agree to the copyright information of this software, and that you are willing to comply The open source agreement of this software. \nThis software is still in the testing stage. If you have any questions, please send feedback to Github.

CosineMath (BoatApp, https://github.com/CosineMath/) Launcher backend support
bangbang93 (BMCLAPI, http://bmclapi2.bangbang93.com/) Chinese domestic high-speed download source support
App icon provider snajdovski
The cooperation and efforts of all members of the AOF software development team(AOF-Dev, https://github.com/AOF-Dev)
All contributors who participated in this project through Issues, Pull Requests, etc.
The copyright of Minecraft belongs to Mojang AB. The software producer is not responsible for copyright issues arising from the use of this software. Please support genuinely.

BMCLAPI provides a high-speed minecraft download source. It is a public welfare project. If you want to support the operation of the project, you can donate it through the following website.\nhttps://afdian.net/@bangbang93
Don\'t check the compatibility of the JVM architecture!
Don\'t check the integrity of Minecraft
Always manually select runtime library by the user
Subject to the Github project provided

If the list is not displayed for a long time, please manually click "Refresh"\nPlease be patient and wait for the download to complete. If the download is slow, please try to change to another download source.
Note: Using "Private Directory" does not need to grant MCinaBox write permissions, but uninstalling MCinaBox will lose all the data in the "Private Directory"!
Java Virtual Machine parameters (no need to fill)
Minecraft additional parameters (no need to fill)
No user is created or selected
Game version is not downloaded or selected
Are you sure that you want to delete the current user?
It seems that this is not a Premium Minecraft Account. Did you purchase Minecraft?
The tipper manager has detected important unprocessed messages. Ignoring these messages may cause abnormal startup. Do you want to continue?
There is error level information, launch is blocked, please handle it in tipper manager.
There are unprocessed messages in the tipper manager, and the user ended the operation.
No game detected, please install a Minecraft version first.
The runtime is not detected, please install the runtime first.
It is detected that the runtime architecture does not match your system architecture, which may cause startup failure or performance loss. Do you want to continue?
The runtime library architecture did not confirm to the system, and the user ended the operation.
The Minecraft JAR main file was not found. Please reinstall the Minecraft version.
Incomplete dependent library detected, missing files:\n%s Do you want to continue?
The Minecraft dependency library is incomplete. Please reinstall the Minecraft version. The user has finished the operation.
If the Minecraft resource index file is not detected, there will be no sound and multi-language support in Minecraft. Do you want to continue?
The Minecraft resource index file is missing, and the user has ended the operation.
Incomplete resource file detected, missing file: \n%s Do you want to continue?
Minecraft resources are incomplete, and the user ended the operation.
It is detected that Forge animation is not disabled. Do you want to disable it?
An unknown error occurred and the forge animation failed to be disabled.
It is detected that the Mipmap level of Minecraft is not 0, which will cause the game fluency to decrease and some rendering errors will occur. Do you want to change the Mipmap level to 0?
An unknown error occurred, %s modification failed!
It is detected that the touch screen mode of Minecraft is turned on, which will make the game difficult to operate. Do you want to turn off the touch screen mode?
An unknown error occurred and the launch arguments generation failed!\nError: %s
Failed to load the keyboard file, the file is damaged!
The keyboard file is loaded successfully!
The file name cannot be empty!
"A file with the same name exists. Do you want to overwrite the existing file? Overwrite operation is not recoverable"
You are about to delete the file %s. This operation cannot be recovered.
You are about to load the file %s. The load operation will clear your current configuration. Please make sure you have saved the current template.
You are about to clear all the currently added custom buttons. This operation will not affect the saved template files. The clearing operation cannot be restored.
Are you sure that you want to restore the default settings?
Are you sure that you want to cancel the download task? This operation will not change the downloaded content.
Are you sure that you want to delete this button? It cannot be restored after performing this operation.
Are you sure that you want to copy this button? After performing this operation, the editing object will be switched to a new button.
The target path is a file, not a folder!"
The target path does not exist, do you want to create a folder?
The game path has been modified successfully!
An unknown error occurred and the path setting failed!
The picture file is damaged, the background picture of the launcher failed to switch!
An unknown error occurred, Forge installation failed!
Please put the picture with the suffix png into the %s folder, the launcher will randomly select one as the background, and this operation will take effect after restarting.
You have turned off the status bar hiding function, and the changes will be applied the next time you start.
%s is about to be deleted. This operation will not make any changes to dependent libraries and resource files. After this operation is performed, it cannot be restored. Do you want to continue?
This operation will restart the app. Do you want to continue?"
You are refreshing the status of the premium account. This operation will delete and re-obtain the credentials of the premium account. Please ensure that the internet is on. Do you want to continue?
You have not selected a user, please select user management in the left navigation bar and create or select a user.
You have not installed the runtime, please select the launcher settings in the left navigation bar and install the runtime.
You have not installed any game version, please select Game List, Install New Game Version in the left navigation bar and install a game version.
The memory limit you set is too low, which may cause the java virtual machine to crash. Please select the launcher setting in the left navigation bar to adjust the memory size.
The memory limit you set is too high, which may cause the java virtual machine to crash. Please select the launcher setting in the left navigation bar to adjust the memory size.

You have disabled the file integrity check. If the game file is incomplete, you will not get any prompts. If the game continues to start when the game is incomplete, it may cause an abnormal crash of Minecraft. Therefore, it is recommended that you turn on the file integrity check.
*Note: The inventory is only visible in the game
*Note: The comfortable position of the jump key needs to be adjusted manually
Memory limit is over total memory.
The default is the official Mojang server
Missing authlib-injector library. Do you want to download it now?
This operation will clear the runtime you have installed. Are you sure you want to continue?
There are no roles available in the current account.
Your account is valid and does not need to be refreshed.
Your account is invalid. Do you want to refresh now?
Are you sure you want to configure the layout automatically? This will change your controller and automatically calculate possible layout locations.
